payload: Remaining Phase 1: 1) Onboarding flow (3 screens: welcome, API key, source selection), 2) Homebrew formula, 3) Demo asset placeholders

Feature: Onboarding flow. Write failing tests for 3-screen onboarding: 1) Welcome screen with value prop, 2) API key setup (Gemini), 3) Source selection (Apple Notes, Obsidian, Local Files). Tests should verify screen navigation, state persistence, and skip-to-main functionality.
tests/onboarding.test.ts: 8 failing tests for onboarding flow (navigation, state persistence, skip-to-main)
